title: Motivating Participation in Learning Networks Using Constructivist-Based Incentive Mechanisms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of IMS Learning Design specifications and experience in learning network operations
context.additional_context: A learning network environment where pre-service and in-service teachers share and collaborate on science education materials using smartphones, necessitating mobile-centric activities due to lack of PC access or limited availability.

learning_goals: Learners voluntarily contribute knowledge to the learning network at least twice weekly over 8 weeks.
Learners utilize at least three additional resources accessible via points earned through the incentive mechanism.
Learners improve participation in sharing science education materials by 40% or more through peer feedback and a point system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
